metadata.source: English by Lorreine Gall - Level 1 Part A

lessons.title: Breakfast and Basic Foods

vocabulary.definition: a hot beverage made from roasted beans
a hot beverage made from leaves

phrases.translation: O que tem para o café da manhã?
Não pule o café da manhã!

example_sentences.sentence: You eat.
example_sentences.translation: Você come.

example_sentences.sentence: I drink.
example_sentences.translation: Eu bebo.

example_sentences.sentence: You drink milk.
example_sentences.translation: Você bebe leite.

example_sentences.sentence: I drink coffee.
example_sentences.translation: Eu bebo café.

example_sentences.sentence: You eat cake.
example_sentences.translation: Você come bolo.

example_sentences.sentence: I eat ham.
example_sentences.translation: Eu como presunto.

example_sentences.sentence: I drink coffee and milk.
example_sentences.translation: Eu bebo café e leite.

example_sentences.sentence: You drink tea and juice.
example_sentences.translation: Você bebe chá e suco.

example_sentences.sentence: I eat cake and I drink soda.
example_sentences.translation: Eu como bolo e bebo refrigerante.

example_sentences.sentence: I eat jam and you eat bread.
example_sentences.translation: Eu como geleia e você come pão.

example_sentences.sentence: I eat bread and ham.
example_sentences.translation: Eu como pão e presunto.

example_sentences.sentence: I eat cheese and you eat ham.
example_sentences.translation: Eu como queijo e você come presunto.

exercises.instructions: Complete the sentences with the correct words

questions.question: I ____ bread.
questions.answer: eat

questions.question: You ____ soda.
questions.answer: drink

questions.question: I ____ coffee and you ____ cake.
Eu como pão e queijo
questions.answer: I eat bread and cheese

questions.question: Você bebe suco e chá
questions.answer: You drink juice and tea

questions.question: Você come bolo e eu como pão
questions.answer: You eat cake and I eat bread

speaking_prompts: What do you eat for breakfast?
Do you drink coffee or tea?
What is your favorite drink?
Do you like bread and cheese?

lessons.title: Meals and Food Preferences

phrases.phrase: Can I see the menu please?
phrases.translation: Posso ver o cardápio, por favor?

phrases.phrase: Could I have the bill please?
phrases.translation: Pode me dar a conta, por favor?

example_sentences.sentence: I like to eat pasta at night.
example_sentences.translation: Eu gosto de comer macarrão a noite.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't eat ice cream in the morning.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não como sorvete de manhã.

example_sentences.sentence: You drink wine and you eat meat for lunch.
example_sentences.translation: Você bebe vinho e come carne no almoço.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like to eat potatoes.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto de comer batatas.

example_sentences.sentence: You don't like to drink a glass of soda.
example_sentences.translation: Você não gosta de beber um copo de refrigerante.

example_sentences.sentence: I like to eat rice and beans.
example_sentences.translation: Eu gosto de comer arroz e feijão.

example_sentences.sentence: You drink a cup of coffee in the morning.
example_sentences.translation: Você bebe uma xícara de café de manhã.

example_sentences.sentence: I eat cakes and puddings with you.
example_sentences.translation: Eu como bolos e pudins com você.

example_sentences.sentence: You don't like to eat fish and bacon for lunch.
example_sentences.translation: Você não gosta de comer peixe e bacon no almoço.

example_sentences.sentence: I eat bread and butter and I drink coffee and milk.
example_sentences.translation: Eu como pão com manteiga e bebo café com leite.

exercises.instructions: Unscramble the words to make correct sentences

questions.question: At, I, drink, night, milk
questions.answer: I drink milk at night

questions.question: Eat, pasta, don't, you
questions.answer: You don't eat pasta

questions.question: Soda, like, you, to, don't, drink
questions.answer: You don't like to drink soda

questions.question: You and I like to drink soda and eat fish
questions.answer: Você e eu gostamos de beber refrigerante e comer peixe

questions.question: You don't eat rice and beans in the morning
questions.answer: Você não come arroz e feijão de manhã

speaking_prompts: What do you like to eat for breakfast?
Do you prefer coffee or tea in the morning?
What is your favorite meal of the day?
Do you like to eat vegetables?
What do you drink with your meals?

lessons.title: Playing and Family

vocabulary.definition: to engage in activity for enjoyment

phrases.phrase: He's a chip off the old block
She's the black sheep of the family
phrases.translation: Ela é a ovelha negra da família

phrases.phrase: I decided to play along with the joke

example_sentences.sentence: Do you like to play the guitar?
example_sentences.translation: Você gosta de tocar guitarra?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like to play alone.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto de brincar sozinho.

example_sentences.sentence: You like to play with your dolls.
example_sentences.translation: Você gosta de brincar com suas bonecas.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't play soccer with my brother.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não jogo futebol com meu irmão.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you play the piano?
example_sentences.translation: Você toca piano?

example_sentences.sentence: I play chess with my sister.
example_sentences.translation: Eu jogo xadrez com minha irmã.

example_sentences.sentence: You like to play blocks with your mother.
example_sentences.translation: Você gosta de montar blocos com sua mãe.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like to play basketball at night.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto de jogar basquete a noite.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you play alone?
example_sentences.translation: Você brinca sozinho?

example_sentences.sentence: You don't like to play the drums.
example_sentences.translation: Você não gosta de tocar bateria.

example_sentences.sentence: I play chess with my friends.
example_sentences.translation: Eu jogo xadrez com meus amigos.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you play the keyboard?
example_sentences.translation: Você toca teclado?

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you play the piano here?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Yes I do, I play the piano here at night.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you like to eat cereal in the morning?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: No I don't, I don't like to eat cereal in the morning.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you drink a cup of coffee and milk at night?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: No I don't, I drink juice at night.

questions.answer: I like to play soccer

questions.question: Você gosta de brincar com seu irmão?
questions.answer: Do you like to play with your brother?

questions.answer: Do you play the guitar at night?

exercises.instructions: Replace the highlighted word with alternatives

questions.question: I don't like to play chess with you.
Do you play alone?

speaking_prompts: Do you eat bread for breakfast?
Do you like to play soccer at night?
Do you drink juice and soda for dinner?
Do you play the guitar?

lessons.title: School, Work and Places

vocabulary.definition: to learn by reading and practice
to do a job or labor

phrases.phrase: May I go to the restroom?
I need to take a day off
phrases.translation: Preciso tirar de um dia de folga

phrases.phrase: Can you give me a hand on this?

example_sentences.sentence: I like to go to school with my mother.
example_sentences.translation: Eu gosto de ir para escola com a minha mãe.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you speak Italian?
example_sentences.translation: Você fala Italiano?

example_sentences.sentence: I go to the gas station alone.
example_sentences.translation: Eu vou ao posto de gasolina sozinho.

example_sentences.sentence: You don't like to speak Portuguese.
example_sentences.translation: Você não gosta de falar português.

example_sentences.sentence: I speak with you at the park.
example_sentences.translation: Eu falo com você no parque.

example_sentences.sentence: You study at school.
example_sentences.translation: Você estuda na escola.

example_sentences.sentence: I study at school with my sister.
example_sentences.translation: Eu estudo na escola com minha irmã.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you go to the drugstore at night?
example_sentences.translation: Você vai a farmácia a noite?

example_sentences.sentence: Do you work at the bank?
example_sentences.translation: Você trabalha no banco?

example_sentences.sentence: You don't go to the movies.
example_sentences.translation: Você não vai ao cinema.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you go home now?
example_sentences.translation: Você vai pra casa agora?

example_sentences.sentence: I study downtown.
example_sentences.translation: Eu estudo no centro da cidade.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you go downtown in the evening?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Yes I do, I go downtown with my grandmother.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you study Portuguese at school in the afternoon?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: No I don't, I study Portuguese in the morning.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you work at the bank with your daughter?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Yes I do, I work with my daughter every day.

questions.question: I work at the bank in the morning
questions.answer: Eu trabalho no banco de manhã

questions.question: Do you speak Italian in the evening?
questions.answer: Você fala italiano a noite?

questions.question: I go to the gas station alone
questions.answer: Eu vou ao posto de gasolina sozinho

questions.question: I don't like to study here alone.
Do you study Portuguese or English?

speaking_prompts: Do you study alone or with your husband?

lessons.title: Preferences and Fruits

vocabulary.definition: large green fruit with red flesh

phrases.phrase: If you prefer, we can go tomorrow
phrases.translation: Se você preferir, podemos ir amanhã

phrases.phrase: I slept like a dog yesterday
phrases.translation: Eu dormi como uma pedra ontem

phrases.phrase: I want you to help me today
phrases.translation: Quero que você me ajude hoje

example_sentences.sentence: I prefer to sleep in the afternoon.
example_sentences.translation: Eu prefiro dormir a tarde.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you want to go home now?
example_sentences.translation: Você quer ir pra casa agora?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like to sleep in the morning.
example_sentences.translation: Não gosto de dormir de manhã.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you prefer to eat bananas or avocados for breakfast?
example_sentences.translation: Você prefere comer bananas ou abacates no café da manhã?

example_sentences.sentence: I like to go to the park with my dog.
example_sentences.translation: Gosto de ir no parque com meu cachorro.

example_sentences.sentence: I like to eat pineapple too.
example_sentences.translation: Eu também gosto de comer abacaxi.

example_sentences.sentence: I also like to study Portuguese.
example_sentences.translation: Eu também gosto de estudar português.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you like this big book?
example_sentences.translation: Você gosta desse livro grande?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like that bike.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto daquela bicicleta.

example_sentences.translation: Você prefere beber um suco de limão?

conversation.text: Do you prefer to study Italian or Spanish?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: I prefer Italian.

conversation.speaker: B

lessons.title: Needs and Activities

phrases.phrase: Sometimes all you need is a little patience
phrases.translation: Às vezes tudo que você precisa é de um pouco de paciência

phrases.phrase: Well done is better than well said
phrases.translation: Bem feito é melhor do que bem dito

phrases.phrase: He's a cold fish in the office
phrases.translation: Ele é uma pessoa fria no escritório

example_sentences.sentence: Sometimes, I need to study here.
example_sentences.translation: Às vezes, eu preciso estudar aqui.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like my steak well done.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto do meu bife bem passado.

example_sentences.sentence: Don't you need to work at the office today?
example_sentences.translation: Você não precisa trabalhar no escritório hoje?

example_sentences.sentence: Do you prefer to go to the bookstore?
example_sentences.translation: Você prefere ir na livraria?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like cold coffee.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto de café frio.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you want to have lunch with me?
example_sentences.translation: Você quer almoçar comigo?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like to eat cold pie.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto de comer torta fria.

example_sentences.sentence: I need to go now, so long.
example_sentences.translation: Eu preciso ir agora, até mais.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't have time tomorrow.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não tenho tempo amanhã.

example_sentences.sentence: Where do you work?
example_sentences.translation: Onde você trabalha?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like you very much.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto muito de você.

example_sentences.sentence: You like to go to the beach on weekends.
example_sentences.translation: Você gosta de ir na praia nos fins de semana.

conversation.text: I prefer cold wine.

lessons.title: Shopping and Clothing

phrases.phrase: The new iPhone is sold out
You need to buy time for me!
phrases.translation: Você precisa ganhar tempo pra mim!

example_sentences.sentence: I need to speak with my manager.
example_sentences.translation: Preciso falar com meu gerente.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you have a boyfriend?

example_sentences.sentence: I want to buy a coat for my mother.
example_sentences.translation: Eu quero comprar um casaco para minha mãe.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you prefer a pen or a pencil?
example_sentences.translation: Você prefere uma caneta ou um lápis?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like bubble gum.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não gosto de chiclete.

example_sentences.translation: Você quer bolo de chocolate?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't like to have lunch with my boss.

example_sentences.translation: Eu quero comprar uma bicicleta.

conversation.text: I prefer pants.

lessons.title: Family and Quantities

vocabulary.definition: to be aware of information; to be acquainted with

example_sentences.sentence: I know your sister.
example_sentences.translation: Eu conheço sua irmã.

example_sentences.sentence: I know how to go downtown.
example_sentences.translation: Eu sei ir ao centro da cidade.

example_sentences.sentence: I like to help my nephew.
example_sentences.translation: Eu gosto de ajudar meu sobrinho.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you know my grandchildren?
example_sentences.translation: Você conhece meus netos?

example_sentences.sentence: How many relatives do you have?
example_sentences.translation: Quantos parentes você tem?

example_sentences.sentence: How much money do you need?
example_sentences.translation: Quanto de dinheiro você precisa?

example_sentences.sentence: I don't have much time.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não tenho muito tempo.

lessons.title: Time and Reading

vocabulary.definition: to look at and understand written words

phrases.phrase: He got up on the wrong side of the bed
phrases.translation: Ele levantou com o pé esquerdo

phrases.phrase: The deadline is at noon tomorrow
phrases.translation: O prazo é ao meio-dia amanhã

example_sentences.sentence: I read to my children.
example_sentences.translation: Eu leio para as minhas crianças.

example_sentences.sentence: What time do you get up?
example_sentences.translation: Que horas você levanta?

example_sentences.sentence: I get up at six o'clock.
example_sentences.translation: Eu levanto as 6hrs.

example_sentences.sentence: I write many emails to my friend.
example_sentences.translation: Eu escrevo muitos emails para minha amiga.

example_sentences.sentence: You go to bed at 10 o'clock.
example_sentences.translation: Você vai pra cama as 10hrs.

example_sentences.sentence: I need to buy new clothes.
example_sentences.translation: Eu preciso comprar roupas novas.

example_sentences.sentence: I write a letter to my boyfriend every day.
example_sentences.translation: Eu escrevo uma carta pra o meu namorado todos os dias.

example_sentences.sentence: The kids go to bed by 9 p.m.
example_sentences.translation: As crianças vão pra cama até 9hrs.

example_sentences.translation: As meninas vão pra escola as 4h20.

example_sentences.sentence: The boys don't study until 2 p.m.
example_sentences.translation: Os meninos não estudam até ás 2hrs.

example_sentences.translation: Qual seu email?

example_sentences.sentence: It's Maria@gmail.com

What do you want to eat now?

lessons.title: House and Understanding

phrases.phrase: The door is always open for you
phrases.translation: A porta está sempre aberta pra você

phrases.phrase: Eyes are the windows to the soul
phrases.translation: Os olhos são as janelas da alma

example_sentences.sentence: I open the kitchen door.
example_sentences.translation: Eu abro a porta da cozinha.

example_sentences.sentence: What time do you close the windows?
example_sentences.translation: Que horas você fecha as janelas?

example_sentences.sentence: I open the drugstore at six o'clock.
example_sentences.translation: Eu abro a farmácia as 6hrs.

example_sentences.sentence: I need to close the car door.
example_sentences.translation: Eu preciso fechar a porta do carro.

example_sentences.sentence: You need to open the school now.
example_sentences.translation: Você precisa abrir a escola agora.

example_sentences.sentence: What time do you go to the lake?
example_sentences.translation: Que horas você vai no lago?

example_sentences.sentence: Do you like my new garden? I have a river here too.
example_sentences.translation: Você gosta do meu jardim novo? Tenho um rio aqui também.

example_sentences.sentence: I have many birds on my window.
example_sentences.translation: Eu tenho muitos passarinhos na minha janela.

example_sentences.sentence: The girls like flowers.
example_sentences.translation: As meninas gostam de flores.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't understand my new boss.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não entendo meu chefe novo.

example_sentences.sentence: Do you understand me?
example_sentences.translation: Você me entende?

example_sentences.sentence: I have water in my fridge.
example_sentences.translation: Eu tenho água dentro da minha geladeira.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you like gardens?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Yes, I like gardens very much.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you understand your child?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Sometimes.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you have a big living room?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Sorry, but I have a small living room.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Do you have lemon soda?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Yes, in my fridge.

questions.question: I ____ to go there at 7:30 today.
questions.answer: want

questions.question: I like to ____ the newspaper every morning.
questions.answer: read

questions.question: Do you want to ____ a new apartment?
questions.answer: buy

speaking_prompts: What do you like to do in the evenings?
Do you need to buy new shoes?
Do you want some cookies?
Where do you want to go tonight?
What do you need to buy for your relatives?
What time do you go to work every day?
How many brothers and sisters do you have?
Do you write emails every day?
When do you need to close the store?
Do you open your windows every morning?
Do you like muffins or do you prefer puddings?

lessons.title: Living and Countries - Third Person

phrases.phrase: How do you spell your name?
The show will go live at 8 p.m.
phrases.translation: O programa será transmitido ao vivo as 8h

phrases.phrase: If you make a mistake, just start over
phrases.translation: Se você cometer um erro, apenas recomece

phrases.phrase: This discussion is far from over
phrases.translation: Essa discussão está longe de terminar
A amizade é uma via de mão dupla

example_sentences.sentence: I live near here.
example_sentences.translation: Eu moro perto daqui.

example_sentences.sentence: I don't live far from here.
example_sentences.translation: Eu não moro longe daqui.

example_sentences.sentence: She doesn't write books.
example_sentences.translation: Ela não escreve livros.

example_sentences.sentence: He doesn't like to sleep here.
example_sentences.translation: Ele não gosta de dormir aqui.

example_sentences.sentence: It starts at 7 pm.
example_sentences.translation: Começa as 7hrs.

example_sentences.sentence: I need to start tonight.
example_sentences.translation: Eu preciso começar hoje a noite.

example_sentences.sentence: Why do you study English?
example_sentences.translation: Porque você estuda inglês?

example_sentences.sentence: Because I love this language.
example_sentences.translation: Porque eu amo essa língua.

example_sentences.sentence: It doesn't start until tomorrow.
example_sentences.translation: Não começa até amanhã.

example_sentences.sentence: Don't you live far from the freeway?
example_sentences.translation: Você não mora longe da rodovia?

example_sentences.sentence: Does he want to go to Mexico this week?
example_sentences.translation: Ele quer ir pro México essa semana?

example_sentences.sentence: It doesn't start today.
example_sentences.translation: Não começa hoje.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: How old are you?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: I am 25 years old.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Where do you live?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: I live near the park.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Why do you study English?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Because I want to travel to Europe.

questions.question: He wants to have ____ with you today.
questions.answer: lunch

questions.question: ____ do you sleep in the afternoon?
questions.answer: Why

questions.question: ____ I study in the morning.
questions.answer: Because

questions.question: Ele não vai dormir às 22 h. Ele vai dormir à meia-noite
questions.answer: He doesn't go to bed at 10 p.m. He goes to bed at midnight

questions.question: Eu quero jantar às 18 h, porque eu almoço às 11 h
questions.answer: I want to have dinner at 6 p.m., because I have lunch at 11 a.m.

questions.question: Você mora longe da escola?
questions.answer: Do you live far from school?

speaking_prompts: Where do you live?
How old are you?
Why do you want to learn English?
Do you live near or far from your work?
Have you been to Europe or Africa?
What countries do you want to visit?
Do you prefer the city or the countryside?
What languages can you speak?

grammar_patterns.explanation: Simple present tense with first and second person
Simple present tense with third person singular

key_highlights: I play THE piano AT school
I drink A cup OF coffee
I eat pasta. I ALSO eat salad
WHEN do you need to go?
I like to go ON WEEKENDS
I want to BUY a car FOR my mother
Do you want to SELL your bike TO me?
I want TO HAVE A SNACK
Do you want to HAVE DINNER?
Do you want THIS pen or THAT pen?
I know your mother (to be acquainted)
I know how to speak Italian (to have knowledge)
I want a slice of cake
Do you want a piece of bread?
How much money do you have?
How many bikes do you have?
I want to speak about my son
Do you need to get up now?
I need to go to bed
I work until 9 p.m. every day
I need to write this by tomorrow
I need to write a letter this afternoon
Do you need to go home this morning?
I want to speak with you tonight
I want to play with you tomorrow night
